# TEST

```css
h2 {
  background-image: url("x");
}
```

```scss
h2 {
  background-image: url("x");
}

$map: (
  'alpha': 10,
  'beta': 20,
  'gamma': 30
);
```

```jsx
const Button = styled.div`
  background-image: url("x");
  color: red;
`;

const styledDiv = <div style={{
  "backgroundImage": "url('x')",
  color: "red",
}}>Hi</div>;
```
